text: abhee zakariya hujare mein khade (ye) dua kar hee rahe the ki farishton ne unako aavaaz dee ki khuda tumako yahaya (ke paida hone) kee khushakhabaree deta hai jo jo kalematullaah (eesa) kee tasdeeq karega aur (logon ka) saradaar hoga aur auraton kee taraf ragabat na karega aur neko kaar nabee hoga
